auctionEnd(uint256).details: End the auction and send the highest bid to the beneficiary

params.auction_id: is the id of the auction

params.bidding_time: how long the bidding will go
params.item_description: is the description of the item
params.reveal_time: how long the reveal will go

params.auction_id: is the id of the auction
params.blindedBid: is the hashed version of bid
params.pubkey: is the public key of the bidder
